page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
A day at{Hurn Court School}starts like this. The lights are switched on at{7 {o'clock,}you have half an hour to get washed and dressed and to make your bed. There are six dormitories where we sleep, three of the dormitories leave at one time the other three later. As soon as we get to the school dining hall we have breakfast.
At{8.45}the different forms go to their rooms for registration and at{9 {o'clock}we go to assembly. After that we go to lessons, there are nine lessons in a day finishing at{5 {o'clock. }Soon after the end of school we go to tea. At{7.30}we go back to where we sleep and that's a day in my life.
